name: Police Bike Crime Patrol Chase 3D Gun Shooter Game
name_original: Police Bike Crime Patrol Chase 3D Gun Shooter Game
description:
Ride police motorbike game in new york city to cope crimes and arrest street gangsters. Play Police Bike Crime Patrol Squad, the latest 3D action packed game to fight crimes and finish scum from great city.

Put criminals behind bars and don’t let prisoner escape from jail. Join squad force and enjoy epic police moto bike chase missions to secure city streets. Good Luck Police Officer! Go, hunt the most wanted criminals with crime patrol squad. Drive armored police bike to shoot down harvley motorcycle and destroy gangster cars. Recruit in NYPD and do honest cop duty to end mayhem and chaos in motorbike simulator game. The bad criminals, gangsters and robbers have taken over all over the newyork city streets. Vicious thugs and bandits from organized crime syndicate are expanding turf in suburban town. This ends now as you ride super fast police motor-bike to finish crime story in mad city. Show extraordinary stunt bike riding skills to complete flying police vs gangster chase missions.


Game Features:
10 intense challenging and police bike shooter levels
Sports heavy bikes andreal racer armored bike shooting
Gangster car shooting and police chase bike missions
Realistic city locations in huge open world environment
Bike wheeling, skidmarks and nitro boost feature
Police siren, lights & multiple camera views including steering view
High quality 3D graphics and amazing sounds


Kindly give your feedback in reviews section so that we may improve our games in future releases.
